rows.label: qev060301_MSG0001
rows.name: Wait! Please listen! My gorkwa is broken! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_JNK0010
rows.name: Grumble

rows.label: qev060301_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you have no idea what that means.

rows.label: qev060301_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev060301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if that's a problem.

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0002
rows.name:
The gorkwa is our staff. *fsssh* It is a gift bestowed
upon the Zaruboggan by our creator, Golbogga. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Holding it aloft allows us to devoltanize voltant.
Praise be to Golbogga's bounty! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Can you shut down every part of your respiratory
apparatus? No more inhaling, no more exhaling?
Impossible, yes? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0005
rows.name:
The gorkwa is my staff. *fsssh* It is to me what lungs
are to you, for the process of devoltanizing it enables
is as crucial to the Zaruboggan as breathing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0006
rows.name:
*fsssh* I am absolutely opposed to allowing another
Zaruboggan to handle my gorkwa. I refuse![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0007
rows.name:
But if it is not repaired, I cannot devoltanize.
And that is a death sentence! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0008
rows.name:
I have decided that I could tolerate a Ma-non touching
it—briefly—if it meant it could be repaired. However...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Well, you are the first non-Zaruboggan I've ever spoken
to. My heart is racing. *fsssh* I'm shaking. *fsssh*
Short of breath. Dizzy... *fsssh* *fsssh* *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Aaargh! I can't take any more. *fsssh* I must entrust
you with my gorkwa—which again I value more than
life—and have you take it to the Ma-non for repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh! Oh, thank you! *fsssh* It pains me dearly to part
with my precious gorkwa, but I leave it in your care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0012
rows.name:
*fsssh* The Ma-non I need you to ask to do the repairs
is called Lulladu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I hear he is extremely interested in Zaruboggan
technology, so my hope is that he will accept. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Phew! I believe this is the longest I have ever
conversed with another. *fsssh* It is an...enjoyable
sort of anxiety.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0015
rows.name:
*fsssh* I have heard that Lulladu does his work
in the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0016
rows.name: Please have him fix my gorkwa as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0017
rows.name:
*fsssh* Aaaah! Not having my gorkwa with me is the
cause of even more anxiety than I had thought![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0018
rows.name:
And being unable to devoltanize has me feeling all out
of sorts besides. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Oh, it's you! *fsssh* Do you have it? Is it fixed?
...Yes? YES?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0020
rows.name:
How marvelous! *fsssh* It is even more beautiful than it
was on the day I received it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0021
rows.name:
*fsssh* Now, if you'll excuse me,
I am off to devoltanize![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0022
rows.name: ...Hmm? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0023
rows.name: I can't get it to link to my backpack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0024
rows.name:
The link function was working perfectly well before...
*fsssh* I wonder what could be the matter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_JNK0030
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev060301_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest that maybe it wasn't repaired properly.

rows.label: qev060301_JNK0040
rows.name: Accuse

rows.label: qev060301_SEL0041
rows.name: Claim that the gorkwa is a fake.

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0025
rows.name:
I suppose that is possible. *fsssh* But did Lulladu seem
so incompetent as to break the item he was repairing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0026
rows.name:
I suppose it would be fastest to go ask him directly.
You don't mind accompanying me, I hope? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0027
rows.name:
F-F-FAKE?! *fsssh* *fsssh* *fsssh*
...No. Surely not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0028
rows.name:
Though it is true that the grip and heft are a bit off.
*fsssh* It feels...less seasoned, somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0029
rows.name:
I suppose it would be fastest to ask Lulladu directly.
Would you mind accompanying me? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0030
rows.name:
Lulladu took my gorkwa to White Phosphor Lake
in Cauldros. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0031
rows.name: Please bring him back safely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0032
rows.name: *fsssh* And more importantly, return my gorkwa![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Devoltanize... Devoltanize! Aaargh! Is this a trial?
*fsssh* Is Golbogga testing me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0034
rows.name: Wait a moment. What...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0035
rows.name: *sniff* *fsssh* *sniff* Ah! I smell traces of voltant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0036
rows.name:
Ah, my gorkwa! You've come home to me! *fsssh*
I'll never let go of you again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0037
rows.name:
Lulladu certainly seems drained. *fsssh* But judging by
his symptoms, he should be fine with a bit of rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0038
rows.name: I am glad he wasn't seriously harmed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0039
rows.name:
*fsssh* It would have been a major incident for a
Ma-non to lose his life to the voltant that sustains ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0040
rows.name: He must have really been desperate to gather some.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0041
rows.name:
Once he is recovered, perhaps he and I can have a
long talk about voltant. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060301_MSG0042
rows.name:
In the meantime, I am off to enjoy some well-deserved
devoltanizing. *fsssh* It has been far too long![ST:wait ]
